explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses the use of machine learning techniques, specifically symbolic regression within Genetic Programming (GP), to develop a credit scoring measure.
explanations.regression: The paper focuses on regression techniques, including symbolic regression and compares it with other regression methods like SVMs and MLPs.
explanations.support vector machine: The paper mentions Support Vector Machines (SVMs) as one of the benchmark techniques used for comparison with the proposed GP-based symbolic regression.
explanations.SVM: SVM is an abbreviation for Support Vector Machines, which are mentioned in the paper as a benchmark technique.
explanations.neural network: The paper mentions Multi-Layer Perceptrons (MLPs) and Radial Basis Function Networks (RBFNs), which are types of neural networks, as benchmark techniques for comparison.
